left-content-text-1: I am a technology enthusiast with projects and interests spanning many IT sectors. I am passionate about both hardware and software, and enjoy bringing creative solutiosn to life both in the physical and virtual world!
left-content-text-2: Enthralled with technology since I was three watching my Father playing battle chess... Loving it since saving up all my summer lawn mowing money to purchase my first 486DX PC from Computer Renaissance.
